name: Grabbing Master
text: You can grapple two foes as easily as one.
prerequisites: Grabbing Drag, Grabbing Style, Improved Grapple; base attack bonus +12, brawler level 8th, or monk level 8th.
benefit: When you are grabbing two opponents while using Grabbing Style, you can use your grapple to move or damage one or both opponents you are grappling, instead of just one.
staminaText: When you are grappling only one opponent while using Grabbing Style, you can spend 5 stamina points to continue to threaten the area within your reach with your free hand until the beginning of your next turn.
text_zh: 抓着两个敌人对你来说就像压住一个家伙一样轻松。
prerequisites_zh: 拖曳手，擒拿手，精通擒抱，BAB+12或拳师等级8或武僧等级8。
benefit_zh: 当你使用擒拿手流派同时擒抱两个对手，只需要一个擒抱动作就可以同时伤害或移动两个被你擒抱的目标。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用擒抱流架势擒抱只有一名敌人时，你可以消耗5点耐力来继续威胁你自由手所能威胁的范围，直到你下一轮开始。
